Package ch.bt.crypto

Class DPRF

java.lang.Object
ch.bt.crypto.DPRF
public class DPRF extends Object
This class is a collection implements delegatable pseudo-random functions from Kiayias et al. using crypto primitives of the Bouncy Castle FIPS API date accessed: 21.11.2023
Author:
Janet Greutmann

      public static byte[] expandData(byte[] data, long left) throws IOException
      Use Expandable Output Function
      Parameters:
      data -
      left - indicates if left (0) or right (1) half should be returned
      Returns:
      left or right half of data expanded by factor 2
